data.message: I wish you left the Messenger choice up to us. I will not download your app . Such a shame and makes me feel as if you are just a bit controlling

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Paula. We're constantly working on the Messenger experience. We hope you'll give it a try and tell us what you think: http://on.fb.me/1uGBwMk -Chantal
She just did. She doesnt like it..
I'm pretty sure I already told you.
Yup, we've all told you the messenger sucks..
I like messenger now. Did not at first.

The messenger is great. You guys are stubborn and not informed enough on the matter. It was invented to improve the experience. If you don't download it, you are only hurting yourself, and no one cares if you don't.
I don't like it privacy concerns   I like the old way
If it isn't broke, don't fix it!! Don't like messenger app and won't use it!

It will not let me download.....every time I install nothing happens...it'll go to a blank page and nothing happens, don't download then shut off, it don't work for me......I hate it, I like the old way
The new messenger lets them have access to everything on your phone.

99% of downloaded applications ask for your information such as access to contact list, photos, camera, ect. If you have an android look at the permissions you grant when installing any app. ( I have an iPhone, however I worked att warranty for years ).
Nope - don't use - glad when I read I could go to Safari to get message so

I now have 8 messages sitting in messenger that I will never see because I'm not downloading it. Could you at least send an automated message to folks that the person they are trying to contact has not yet downloaded messenger and will not be able to view their messages?
Tammie open FB using safari or what browser you have. You'll be able to read your PMs.
